FuncDef:
The if-match ip next-hop acl command configures a filtering rule that is based on next-hop IP addresses.
The undo if-match ip next-hop acl command cancels the configuration. The if-match ip next-hop acl command configures a filtering rule that is based on next-hop IP addresses. The undo if-match ip next-hop acl command cancels the configuration. By default, no filtering rule based on next-hop IP addresses is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of a basic ACL.
The value is an integer ranging from 2000 to 2999.

Specifies the name of a named basic ACL.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the ACL for route filtering.
-
